Description: Example 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  battery: 100,
  angle_x: 0,
  angle_y: 0,
  angle_z: 90,
  threhold_x: 'normal',
  threhold_y: 'trigger',
  threhold_z: 'normal'
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 },
  'angle:0': { unitId: 'deg', record: 0, nature: 'Angle x' },
  'angle:1': { unitId: 'deg', record: 0, nature: 'Angle y' },
  'angle:2': { unitId: 'deg', record: 90, nature: 'Angle z' }
}
